医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
队列研究显示，夜间睡眠模式与不健康的生活方式和糖尿病风险增加有关https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Evening-chronotype-linked-to-unhealthy-lifestyles-and-increased-diabetes-risk-reveals-cohort-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Evening-chronotype-linked-to-unhealthy-lifestyles-and-increased-diabetes-risk-reveals-cohort-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=daa47a44-ae3e-4492-bf60-b8042095abbd Tue, 12 Sep 2023 12:00:00 -0400 Evening chronotype linked to unhealthy lifestyles and increased diabetes risk, reveals cohort study
“反向疫苗”有望在不关闭免疫系统其余部分的情况下逆转自身免疫性疾病芝加哥大学普利兹克分子工程学院 (PME) 的研究人员开发的一种新型疫苗在实验室环境中表明，它可以完全逆转多发性硬化症、1 型糖尿病和克罗恩病等自身免疫性疾病；所有这些都不会关闭免疫系统的其余部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/e2809cInverse-vaccinee2809d-shows-promise-to-reverse-autoimmune-diseases-without-shutting-down-rest-of-the-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/e2809cInverse-vaccinee2809d-shows-promise-to-reverse-autoimmune-diseases-without-shutting-down-rest-of-the-immune-system.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d18c03e-7f10-4b16-a9ec-0c32fc57136b Tue, 12 Sep 2023 11:47:22 -0400 “Inverse vaccine” shows promise to reverse autoimmune diseases without shutting down rest of the immune system
研究人员开发了一种用于伤口愈合治疗的可穿戴生物电子系统研究人员提出了一种可穿戴生物电子系统，用于提供与伤口愈合相关的治疗剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Researchers-develop-a-wearable-bioElectronic-system-for-wound-healing-treatment-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Researchers-develop-a-wearable-bioElectronic-system-for-wound-healing-treatment-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30fb2167-b834-46ba-8b7a-aa3b8ccdd88d Tue, 12 Sep 2023 11:44:00 -0400 Researchers develop a wearable bioelectronic system for wound healing treatment delivery
研究人员发现年龄相关性黄斑变性进展的新机制由 Nicolas Bazan 医学博士、博伊德教授、Ernest C. 和 Yvette C. Villere 视网膜变性研究主席、路易斯安那州立大学健康新奥尔良医学院神经科学卓越中心主任领导的研究表明，年龄相关黄斑变性 (AMD) 会减少必需脂肪酸，从而阻止一类保护性分子的形成并降低修复潜力。这一发现也可能为 AMD 开辟新的治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Researchers-discover-new-mechanism-in-progression-of-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Researchers-discover-new-mechanism-in-progression-of-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ff1e2c6-8d24-4fc7-a65c-ccfd0f6d0e27 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 11:41:00 -0400 Researchers discover new mechanism in the progression of age-related macular degeneration
